title.rendered: Technology Services For Faculty and Staff

content.rendered:
Faculty and Staff Account Setup

Find out how to get your accounts such as email, Blackboard, and La Verne Portal; how to get connected to the university network; and more. Current faculty and staff.

Technology Services

  • Computer labs on campus

  • Requesting a technology project (online form)
  • Sending mass student emails (online form, requires SSO)

  • Training Events and Resources
  • Using the phone system
  • Wireless internet access/FAQs
  • Network login FAQs
  • Virtual Desktop Instruction

Requesting Accounts

  • Requesting a Banner account

Go to the Information and FAQs to find out technology policies, wireless connection FAQ, network login FAQs, and more…

For any other technical information or problems, please contact the Unified Service Desk.
